    • Uses of SerializerWriter in org.apache.juneau.serializer

      Methods in org.apache.juneau.serializer that return SerializerWriter 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SerializerWriter SerializerWriter.append(char c) 
      SerializerWriter SerializerWriter.append(int indent, char c)
      Writes an indent (if the useIndentation setting is enabled), followed by text.
      SerializerWriter SerializerWriter.append(int indent, String text)
      Writes an indent (if the useIndentation setting is enabled), followed by text.
      SerializerWriter SerializerWriter.append(Object text)
      Writes the specified text to the writer.
      SerializerWriter SerializerWriter.append(String text)
      Writes the specified text to the writer.
      SerializerWriter SerializerWriter.appendIf(boolean b, char c)
      Writes the specified text to the writer if b is true.
      SerializerWriter SerializerWriter.appendIf(boolean b, String text)
      Writes the specified text to the writer if b is true.
      SerializerWriter SerializerWriter.appendln(int indent, String text)
      Writes an indent (if the useIndentation setting is enabled), followed by text, followed by a newline (if the useIndentation setting is enabled).
      SerializerWriter SerializerWriter.appendln(String text)
      Writes the specified text followed by a newline (if the useIndentation setting is enabled).
      SerializerWriter SerializerWriter.appendUri(Object uri)
      Appends the specified object as a URI.
      SerializerWriter SerializerWriter.cr(int depth)
      Performs a carriage return.
      SerializerWriter SerializerWriter.i(int indent)
      Writes an indent to the writer if the useIndentation setting is enabled.
      SerializerWriter SerializerWriter.nl()
      Writes a newline to the writer if the useIndentation setting is enabled.
      SerializerWriter SerializerWriter.q()
      Adds the quote character specified by the quoteChar setting to the output.
      SerializerWriter SerializerWriter.s()
      Adds a whitespace character to the output if the useWhitespace setting is enabled.
